name: Ingevity Corporation
description: Ingevity Corporation is a leading provider of specialty chemicals and engineered materials. Founded in 2016 as a spin-off from the Eastman Chemical Company, Ingevity focuses on sustainable solutions that enhance performance and reduce environmental impact. The company operates in two primary segments: Performance Chemicals and Performance Materials. Ingevity's Performance Chemicals segment produces activated carbon products, which are widely used for air and water treatment, as well as industrial applications. Their Performance Materials segment specializes in high-performance resins and additives that are essential in various applications including automotive, consumer products, and electronics. Ingevity is committed to innovation, sustainability, and customer satisfaction, continually investing in research and development to create advanced materials that meet the evolving needs of its diverse customer base. With a strong emphasis on reducing carbon footprints and improving resource efficiency, Ingevity is well-positioned to capitalize on the growing demand for sustainable solutions across industries. The company’s mission is to provide sustainable and innovative materials that help customers thrive while contributing positively to the environment.
